New Features

  • Adds suggested icons to the icon picker

Fixes and Improvements

  • The icon picker now dismisses after selecting an icon
  • Limits the height of the icon picker popover
  • Fixes an issue that caused the inspector to sometimes show a modified state of a point of interest

Known Issues

  • The Save Changes and Revert Changes buttons flash briefly after selecting a point of interest
  • After creating an item, it is not automatically selected
  • When creating a new item, the Title Prefix text field is focused instead of the Title text field
  • When creating a new item from the File → New menu, the currently selected items are not used as defaults for the new item. Use the Create Item menu in the toolbar instead
  • The keyboard shortcut for creating a new point of interest is currently only assigned to the toolbar command until using the menu bar command uses the correct defaults for new items. To make the app recognize the keyboard shortcut, the toolbar menu needs to be opened once after launch
  • The New Location window is initially narrower than intended

New Features

  • Adds icons and the ability to pick icons for resorts, locations, areas, and points of interest

Fixes and Improvements

  • Text in list rows is now truncated instead of wrapped to a new line
  • Sets a minimum width for list columns
  • The inspector can now be resized
  • Fixes a layout issue in the filter interface for points of interest

Known Issues

  • The inspector does not update correctly in some situations

  • The New Location window is initially narrower than intended
